snippet: The insurgency will burn out, to the benefit of its sworn Shiite enemies.
abstract: Op-Ed article by policy expert Steven Simon argues that for all its military success, Sunni incursion in Iraq is doomed to failure as it hardens and mobilizes the nation's large Shiite majority; examines country's history of sectarian conflict; argues that one likely outcome will be a Shiite rump state in Iraq that is ever more in thrall to Iran, result that is in opposition to American interests in region.
lead_paragraph: The insurgency will burn out, to the benefit of its sworn Shiite enemies.

headline.seo: ISIS Will Fail in Iraq, and Iran Will Be the Victor

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
